name: The Shattered Throne
description: Strike back at the curse that plagues the Dreaming City.

exoticWeapon.name: Wish-Ender
exoticWeapon.description: 'Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch.' —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath

exoticperks.name: Queen's Wrath
exoticperks.description: While aiming down sights with a fully drawn Bow, combatants behind walls are highlighted and arrows pierce shields. Strong against [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions.

exoticperks.name: Broadhead
exoticperks.description: Piercing arrowhead that damages the target on entry and exit. One shot can overpenetrate multiple targets.

encounters.name: Erebus: The Labyrinth
encounters.description: Defeat the Taken in the labyrinth.
encounters.mini_guide: The Labyrinth is the first and easiest section of the Shattered Throne dungeon, though it takes time to complete. Players must defeat a Labyrinth Architect to reveal a glowing symbol, which directs them to a matching carved symbol elsewhere in the area. By locating and clearing enemy groups at these symbols, players progress through the Labyrinth. The final symbol, Bird Fly Down, signals the last fight before receiving loot and unlocking the vault to continue deeper into the dungeon.

images.meta: Symbols that you will encounter in the labyrinth.

encounters.name: The Descent
encounters.description: Defeat the Taken in the labyrinth.
encounters.mini_guide: After clearing the open area of enemies, descend and take the stairs to face a Taken Captain boss. Eliminate him and his allies to unlock the next section. Proceed carefully through a sniper-filled hallway, clearing enemies before advancing. In the next room, navigate narrow beams while dealing with Ogres that can knock you into the pit below. Finally, push through a Taken film that slows movement, avoiding swarming Thrall, before climbing a large wall to reach the boss fight.

encounters.name: Vorgeth, the Corrupted
encounters.description: Defeat Vorgeth, the Corrupted.
encounters.mini_guide: Vorgeth is immune until you defeat four Wizards around the room and collect their buffs. Move clockwise as a team, ensuring someone stays alive to retain the buffs. Once all four Wizards are down, deposit the buffs into the fires to make Vorgeth vulnerable. During this phase, avoid his deadly Axiom Bolts and deal as much damage as possible. If he survives, repeat the process until he's defeated.

encounters.name: The Climb
encounters.description: Climb the tower to face the next challenge.
encounters.mini_guide: After defeating Vorgeth, interact with Sjur Eido's statue to remove the Awoken Talisman and begin the Wish-Ender quest. Move forward, clearing Wizards and using lifts to ascend. Repeat this process until you reach a dead end, then take a right and carefully navigate the exploding wall. Push through the Taken Hobgoblins and hazardous obstacles before riding the final lifts to the last boss fight.

encounters.name: Dul Incaru, the Corrupted
encounters.description: Defeat Dul Incaru, the Corrupted.
encounters.mini_guide: At the start of the fight, clear all Psions immediately to avoid being overwhelmed. Handle the three Knights carefully, bringing them down evenly before finishing them with Supers or heavy ammo. Destroy Dul Incaru's summoned crystal when it appears to remove the Knights' shield. Once the Knights are dead, collect their buffs and focus on Dul Incaru. Use the damage boost to defeat her quickly, cleansing the buff over the cauldron if necessary. With her defeat, you've conquered the Shattered Throne.

triumphs.name: A Hidden Death
triumphs.description: Enter Mara Sov's throne world.

triumphs.name: Never Again
triumphs.description: Complete the dungeon "The Shattered Throne."

triumphs.name: Curse This
triumphs.description: Complete the "The Shattered Throne" dungeon as a fireteam without dying and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Solo-nely
triumphs.description: Complete the "The Shattered Throne" dungeon solo and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Seriously, Never Again
triumphs.description: Complete "The Shattered Throne" dungeon solo without dying and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Come at Me
triumphs.description: Complete the dungeon "The Shattered Throne" while wearing a full set of unpurified Reverie Dawn gear.

triumphs.name: A Thorny Predicament
triumphs.description: Overcome the Keepers of Petitions in the dungeon "The Shattered Throne" without extinguishing more than one sigil.

triumphs.name: Douse the Forge
triumphs.description: Defeat Dûl Incaru, the Eternal Return, without allowing any of her Fatesmiths to respawn.

triumphs.name: Gimme That Bow
triumphs.description: Prove yourself worthy to Sjur Eido, the first Queen's Wrath.

triumphs.name: Once More, Together
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of clanmates.

triumphs.name: Unified Front
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a fireteam made entirely of the same Guardian class.

triumphs.name: Electrostatic Force
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Arc subclasses.

triumphs.name: Scorched Grasp
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Solar subclasses.

triumphs.name: Endless Abyss
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Void subclasses.

triumphs.name: Frozen Over
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Stasis subclasses.

triumphs.name: Threads of Fate
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Strand subclasses.

name: Pit of Heresy
description: Deep beneath Sorrow's Harbor, the Hive keep their darkest secrets.
notes: Blasphemer, Apostate, and Heretic all require 'Hymm of Desecration' in order to drop

exoticWeapon.name: Xenophage

exoticperks.name: Rangefinder
exoticperks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.

exoticWeapon.source: Acquired from the "Metamorphosis" quest in the Pit of Heresy dungeon.

encounters.name: Necropolis
encounters.description: A sprawling city-like structure where players must defeat minibosses using Hive swords.
encounters.mini_guide: Locate three symbols in a room, find their matching holograms outside, and defeat the minibosses inside each corresponding room. Use the Hive Relic sword's specific attacks—light for Knights, heavy for Wizards, and guard for Shriekers. Once all three minibosses are defeated, follow the green light to exit.

encounters.name: Tunnels of Despair
encounters.description: A dark, maze-like cave system filled with invincible Ogres and blocked doors.
encounters.mini_guide: To progress, shoot the webbing to enter tunnels, defeat Heretical Knights, and collect their orbs. Dunk these orbs at three barriers scattered around the map to unlock the path forward. The challenge lies in sneaking past or distracting the patrolling Ogres while securing the orbs. Players completing the Xenophage quest will need to take a brief detour in this encounter.

encounters.name: Chamber of Suffering
encounters.description: A grueling endurance fight requiring players to stay on a plate while waves of enemies attack.
encounters.mini_guide: Stand on the plate under the Annihilator Totem to prevent an instant wipe. Defeat Heretical Knights to collect and dunk six orbs, extinguishing the runes and unlocking the exit. Be mindful of accumulating Curse of Suffering stacks, which increase incoming damage.

encounters.name: The Harrow
encounters.description: A labyrinth filled with traps and powerful Wizards that must be eliminated to break seals.
encounters.mini_guide: Identify three symbols at the entrance, then find their corresponding locations in the maze. Defeat the Malevolent Ritualist Wizards near each symbol to break the locks. Watch out for environmental hazards and enemies while navigating the labyrinth.

encounters.name: Zulmak, Instrument of Torment
encounters.description: A high-intensity boss fight requiring sword combat, coordinated damage phases, and survival tactics.
encounters.mini_guide: Defeat Knights to acquire swords, then use them to eliminate minibosses around the arena (light attack for Knights, heavy for Wizards, guard for Shriekers). Collect and dunk three orbs in the center to trigger the damage phase against Zulmak. Stand inside the arena to deal damage but exit before the charged crystal explodes. Repeat until Zulmak is defeated.

triumphs.name: Destroyer of Heretics
triumphs.description: Complete the Pit of Heresy.

triumphs.name: Eternal Heretic
triumphs.description: Complete the "Pit of Heresy" dungeon as a fireteam without dying and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Usurper
triumphs.description: Complete the "Pit of Heresy" dungeon solo and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Savior of the Deep
triumphs.description: Complete the "Pit of Heresy" dungeon solo without dying and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Metamorphosis
triumphs.description: Follow the clues and acquire the Exotic Machine Gun, Xenophage.

triumphs.name: Once More, Together
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of clanmates.

triumphs.name: Electrostatic Force
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Arc subclasses.

triumphs.name: Scorched Grasp
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Solar subclasses.

triumphs.name: Endless Abyss
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Void subclasses.

triumphs.name: Frozen Over
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Stasis subclasses.

triumphs.name: Threads of Fate
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of Strand subclasses.

triumphs.name: Unified Front
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a fireteam made entirely of the same Guardian class.

name: Prophecy
description: Enter the realm of the Nine and ask the question: "What is the nature of the Darkness?"

secretChests.name: Secret Chest 1
secretChests.description: Located in the first encounter, behind a wall of light.

secretChests.name: Secret Chest 2
secretChests.description: Located in the second encounter, behind a wall of light.

encounters.name: Entrance
encounters.description: The opening encounter requires players to collect and deposit Light or Dark Motes to cleanse energy pillars and progress.
encounters.mini_guide: Defeat Taken Knights to spawn Motes, ensuring you stand in the correct lighting to generate either Light or Dark Motes. Collect five matching Motes, then deposit them at the corresponding pillar to cleanse it. Avoid mixing Motes before reaching five stacks, as this will reset your progress. Repeat the process to clear all pillars, then follow the Taken Captain up the debris to reach the first boss encounter.

encounters.name: Phalanx Echo
encounters.description: This fight involves cleansing pillars with Motes while avoiding the boss's powerful knockback attacks.
encounters.mini_guide: Defeat enemies to collect Motes and deposit them at the designated pillars to remove the Phalanx Echo’s shield. Stay mobile to avoid being launched off the platform by its shield blasts. Clear waves of Taken Psions and Knights strategically to manage add pressure. Use the high ground to cleanse two pillars at once and speed up the encounter.

encounters.name: Heaven/Hell (Wasteland)
encounters.description: A movement-heavy section where players must destroy Taken Blights and navigate through a vast desert.
encounters.mini_guide: Ride your Sparrow or skate across the dunes while avoiding Taken Minotaurs and locate three Taken Blights. Use Chior of One or fast-firing weapons to destroy them quickly, then follow the floating Toland orb to reveal the exit. Repeat this process three times before heading into the large cube structure that leads to the next encounter.

encounters.name: Hexahedron
encounters.description: A rotating cube arena where players must cleanse the correct pillar to advance.
encounters.mini_guide: Locate the floating Toland orb to identify which pillar needs cleansing. Defeat Taken enemies, including dangerous Hobgoblins on ledges, before purifying the pillar beneath Toland's light. Stand on the center plate after each cleanse to rotate the room and repeat the process. After enough cycles, defeat the two Centurion bosses to complete the encounter.

encounters.name: Singularity (Rainbow Road)
encounters.description: A high-speed platforming section requiring precise Sparrow control and navigation.
encounters.mini_guide: Speed down the floating path while dodging enemy fire and gaps in the track. If aiming for a flawless run, take it slow to avoid falling off. Look for floating platforms when the road seems to end, using them to progress. A hidden chest can be found in the final floating structure before the gravity lift.

encounters.name: Kell Echo
encounters.description: The final boss fight features multiple damage phases, teleporting mechanics, and a Dark Entropy debuff.
encounters.mini_guide: Cleanse three pillars by collecting and depositing Motes to remove the immunity of Kell Echo’s clones, then defeat the Taken Ogres that spawn. Engage the boss in a tight arena while managing Dark Entropy—stay within Kell Echo’s ring to prevent an instant death. Clear Hobgoblins quickly before focusing on DPS, using high-damage weapons like Anarchy or Witherhoard. Repeat the cleanse and DPS cycle until Kell Echo is defeated, completing the dungeon.

triumphs.name: Prophecy Complete
triumphs.description: Complete the "Prophecy" dungeon

triumphs.name: Prophecy Dungeon Flawless
triumphs.description: Complete the "Prophecy" dungeon as a fireteam without dying and without leaving the activity.
requirements: Complete the "Prophecy" dungeon as a fireteam without dying and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Prophecy Dungeon Solo
triumphs.description: Complete the "Prophecy" dungeon solo and without leaving the activity.
requirements: Complete the "Prophecy" dungeon solo and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Prophecy Dungeon Solo Flawless
triumphs.description: Complete the "Prophecy" dungeon solo without dying and without leaving the activity.

triumphs.name: Urn It
triumphs.description: Collect all the hidden urns in the dungeon "Prophecy."

triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a full fireteam of clanmates.

triumphs.name: Electrostatic Force

triumphs.description: Complete all encounters with a fireteam made entirely of the same Guardian class.

name: Grasp of Avarice
description: A cautionary tale for adventurers willing to trade their humanity for riches.
notes: Final encounter drops 2x Weapon and/or Armor

exoticWeapon.name: Gjallarhorn
exoticWeapon.description: 'If there is beauty in destruction, why not also in its delivery?' — Feizel Crux

exoticperks.name: Wolfpack Rounds
exoticperks.description: Rounds fired split into tracking cluster missiles upon detonation.

exoticperks.name: Pack Hunter
exoticperks.description: Gain increased handling and reload speed when standing near allies. Firing this weapon also grants Wolfpack Rounds to nearby allies wielding non-Exotic Rocket Launchers.

encounters.name: The Loot Cave
encounters.description: Deposit Burdened by Riches into the crystal while managing enemies.
encounters.mini_guide: Defeat enemies to collect engrams that apply the Burdened by Riches debuff. Gather as many as possible before heading into the cave to stand near the crystal, which will consume the stacks. Keep an eye on the 30-second timer, as failing to deposit in time results in death. Repeat the process until 'The remnants have quieted' appears, then proceed through the crystal caverns to the next encounter

encounters.name: The Rusted Gangplank
encounters.description: Navigate through doors, levers, and platforming challenges to unlock the path forward.
encounters.mini_guide: Traverse through the caves, making your way past enemies, hidden doors, and traps. Enter the left door, avoid the pressure plate trap, and pull the lever. Head through the newly opened tunnel, carefully crossing the pit by using the correct platforms and side paths. Solve the lever puzzle to open doors and progress through the abyss, eventually reaching a circular chamber. Here, use the Scorch Cannon to activate generators in order: 03, 04, 01, and 02. Defeat the Scorch Vandal, unlock the final door, and make your way to the first boss encounter.

encounters.name: Phry'zhia the Insatiable
encounters.description: Use Burdened by Riches and Scorch Cannons to break the boss's shield and deal damage.
encounters.mini_guide: Defeat Vandals to obtain Scorch Cannons, then use them to open doors and spawn enemies. Eliminate enemies to collect Burdened by Riches and deposit them at the crystal to remove Phry'zhia's shield. Once the shield is down, damage the boss until the phase ends. If necessary, repeat the process. Warlocks can use Well of Radiance for extra damage, and collecting 10 Burdened by Riches instantly restores your Super, helping maximize DPS.

encounters.name: Sparrow Racing
encounters.description: Race through the track, defusing mines while extending the timer with buttons.
encounters.mini_guide: Speed through the course, hitting buttons to prolong the mine timers while avoiding obstacles. Defuse Mines A, B, C, and D in sequence by reaching them before the timer expires. A quick-summon Sparrow and cooldown reduction mod can help if you crash. Pay attention to button locations, such as under shipwrecks, near debris, and before gravity cannons, to maximize time. Once the final mine is defused, proceed to the next area.

encounters.name: Sunken Lair
encounters.description: Use Scorch Cannons and Burdened by Riches to disable shields and destroy the Fallen Shield.
encounters.mini_guide: Find a Vandal, take its Scorch Cannon, and use gravity cannons to navigate platforms. Defeat enemies, collect Burdened by Riches, and deposit it at the crystal to remove a Servitor’s shield. Eliminate the Servitor, then push its shell onto a gravity cannon aimed at the central structure. Fire a Scorch Cannon shot to launch the shell, destroying a node. Repeat this process until all four nodes are gone, then use the gravity cannon to reach the reward area.

encounters.name: Avarokk the Covetous
encounters.description: Use Scorch Cannons to generate Burdened by Riches engrams and deposit them to break Avarokk’s shield.
encounters.mini_guide: Defeat the Vandal to obtain a Scorch Cannon, then fire it at one of the generators to release Burdened by Riches engrams. Collect and deposit at least 60 engrams at the central crystal to remove Avarokk’s shield. Once the message appears, deal as much damage as possible during the 30-second DPS phase. When Avarokk becomes immune, repeat the process until the boss is defeated.

reward.name: The Deepest Truth

triumphs.name: Devil in the Details
triumphs.description: Find and listen to each devilish recording throughout the "Spire of the Watcher" dungeon.

reward.name: Increases initial chance for Hierarchy of Needs to drop.

triumphs.name: Blaze a Trail into the Black
triumphs.description: Obtain the Hierarchy of Needs Exotic Bow from the "Spire of the Watcher" dungeon.

description: Drown in the deep, or rise from it.

triumphs.description: Complete the "Ghosts of the Deep" dungeon.

triumphs.name: Navigator's Companion
triumphs.description: Obtain The Navigator Exotic Trace Rifle from the "Ghosts of the Deep" dungeon.

name: Warlord's Ruin
description: Nestled deep in the mountains of the EDZ, Scorn lay claim to a Dark Age castle containing dangerous relics, and a blighted vengeance festers in the dirt.

triumphs.name: Collect the Debts of Kings, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon.

reward.name: Shattered Fortress

triumphs.name: Their Blood, Not Yours, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon without dying.

reward.name: Increases initial Buried Bloodline drop rate.

triumphs.name: She Stood Alone, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon solo without leaving the activity.

reward.name: Increases initial Buried Bloodline drop rate.

triumphs.name: Become Naeem's Avatar, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon solo without dying or leaving the activity.

reward.name: Increases initial Buried Bloodline drop rate.

triumphs.name: Before Your Clans, Mine Thrived, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon with a full fireteam of clanmates.

triumphs.name: Carry My Roar Like Thunder, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon with a full fireteam of Arc subclasses.

triumphs.name: Our Fates Are Woven, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon with a full fireteam of Strand subclasses.

triumphs.name: Your Fury Burns Bright, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon with a full fireteam of Solar subclasses.

triumphs.name: Deliver the Chill of Grief, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon with a full fireteam of Stasis subclasses.

triumphs.name: Feast Upon the Gulf, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon with a full fireteam of Void subclasses.

triumphs.name: Show Me Your Prowess, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon with a full fireteam of the same class.

triumphs.name: Withstand the Siege, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon on Master difficulty.

reward.name: Increases initial Buried Bloodline drop rate.

triumphs.name: Heed the Whispers, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Find Ahamkara bones strewn throughout the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon, and hear their accompanying story.

reward.name: Increases initial Buried Bloodline drop rate.

triumphs.name: Do You Desire This Trinket, O Vengeance Mine?
triumphs.description: Earn the Buried Bloodline Exotic weapon from the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon.

triumphs.name: Cut with Dark Age Steel, O Vengeance Mine
triumphs.description: Complete the "Warlord's Ruin" dungeon with a fireteam using only Swords, Bows, and Glaives. Final blows with any other weapon will fail this challenge.

name: Vesper's Host
description: Defy the algorithm. Cut through its web.

triumphs.name: Vesper's Champion
triumphs.description: Complete the "Vesper's Host" dungeon.

reward.name: Anomalous

triumphs.name: Orbital Tournament
triumphs.description: Complete the "Vesper's Host" dungeon on contest mode.

reward.name: Vespertine

triumphs.name: Flawless Networking
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon without dying and without leaving the activity.

reward.name: Increases initial Ice Breaker drop rate.

triumphs.name: Alone in the Dark
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon solo and without leaving the activity.

reward.name: Increases initial Ice Breaker drop rate.

triumphs.name: Perfect Solitude
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon solo, without dying, and without leaving the activity.

reward.name: Increases initial Ice Breaker drop rate.

triumphs.name: True Unity
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon with a full fireteam of clanmates.

triumphs.name: Collective Energy
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon with a full fireteam of Arc subclasses.

triumphs.name: Bound to Win
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon with a full fireteam of Strand subclasses.

triumphs.name: Burning Together
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon with a full fireteam of Solar subclasses.

triumphs.name: Glacier's Way
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon with a full fireteam of Stasis subclasses.

triumphs.name: Deep Space
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon with a full fireteam of Void subclasses.

triumphs.name: Together as One
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Vesper's Host" dungeon with a full fireteam of the same class.

triumphs.name: Stationmaster
triumphs.description: Complete the "Vesper's Host" dungeon on Master difficulty.

reward.name: Increases initial Ice Breaker drop rate.

triumphs.name: Buried Secrets
triumphs.description: Unlock Vesper Station's accesses and discover the mysteries of its past.

reward.name: Increases initial Ice Breaker drop rate.

triumphs.name: Shattered Ice
triumphs.description: Earn the Exotic Sniper Rifle Ice Breaker.

triumphs.name: The Elsie Special
triumphs.description: Complete the "Vesper's Host" dungeon using only Pulse Rifles and Sniper Rifles.

triumphs.name: Access Override
triumphs.description: Unlock more of Vesper Station's secrets and gain the ability to focus armor at the second-level BrayTech storage module.

reward.name: Sub-Director Level Access Token

triumphs.name: Director Access
triumphs.description: Pick Dr. Bray's final lock and gain full access to the second-level BrayTech storage module.

reward.name: BrayTech Storage Module: Full Access

name: Sundered Doctrine
description: Power lies in the deepest vault.

triumphs.name: The Sundering
triumphs.description: Complete the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon.

reward.name: Unsounded Depths

triumphs.name: Unsundered
triumphs.description: Complete the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon on Contest difficulty.

reward.name: Last Erasure

triumphs.name: Undying Deity
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon as a fireteam without dying and without leaving the activity.

reward.name: Increases initial Finality's Auger drop rate.

triumphs.name: Lonely Travels
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon solo and without leaving the activity.

reward.name: Increases initial Finality's Auger drop rate.

triumphs.name: Minotaur of the Labyrinth
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon solo without dying and without leaving the activity.

reward.name: Increases initial Finality's Auger drop rate.

triumphs.name: Buried Together
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon with a full fireteam of clanmates.

triumphs.name: Lightning Round
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon with a full fireteam of Arc subclasses.

triumphs.name: Weaver's Match
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon with a full fireteam of Strand subclasses.

triumphs.name: Shared Fire
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon with a full fireteam of Solar subclasses.

triumphs.name: Crystal Formation
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon with a full fireteam of Stasis subclasses.

triumphs.name: Space Cadets
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon with a full fireteam of Void subclasses.

triumphs.name: Stable Triangle
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon with a full fireteam of the same class.

triumphs.name: Military Doctrine
triumphs.description: Complete the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon on Master difficulty.

reward.name: Increases initial Finality's Auger drop rate.

triumphs.name: Laboratory Inspector
triumphs.description: Find all collectibles within the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon.

reward.name: Increases initial Finality's Auger drop rate.

triumphs.name: Writing on the Wall
triumphs.description: Earn the Exotic Linear Fusion Rifle, Finality's Auger.

triumphs.name: Dreadful Munitions
triumphs.description: Complete all encounters in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon using only Shotguns, Hand Cannons, and Linear Fusion Rifles.

triumphs.name: Hidden Treasures
triumphs.description: Complete the "Drowning Labyrinth" quest to gain the ability to focus gear in the "Sundered Doctrine" dungeon.
